entry.title: Protein Popsicles
entry.content:
Protein popsicles are a fun and delicious way to enjoy the benefits of protein, especially during the warmer months. And with our SEEQ Protein, you can now make protein popsicles that not only pack a protein punch, but also taste amazing! Our protein is known for being the best-tasting protein in the industry, and when combined with your favorite fruit juice, it creates a juicy and refreshing protein-packed treat that you won't be able to resist. So, grab your popsicle tray and let's get started!

Cook Time: 60 minutes

Servings: 2-4

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1 scoop of your favorite SEEQ Protein flavor
  • 4 oz water
  • 4 oz of any fruit juice
INSTRUCTIONS:
  1. Add 1 scoop of your favorite SEEQ Protein flavor to the water and fruit juice and mix in a blender bottle.
  2. Allow the foam to settle before pouring the mix into a popsicle tray.
  3. Freeze the popsicles for about 45 minutes, or until frozen solid.
  4. Take the popsicles out of the tray and enjoy!

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • Wanna make things more unique? Use different shaped molds to turn your popsicles into something cold and creative. All you need are some popsicle sticks, your fun ice mold, and your protein packed mixture and you are good to go. Why have normal shaped popsicles when these popsicles are anything but normal anyway!
  • If your mold is big enough — add some fruit to your protein mixture before putting it into the freezer. That way you have an extra sweet treat halfway through your dessert.

entry.title: High Protein Yogurt
entry.content:
What if we told you that you could get almost 40 grams of protein in just half a cup of yogurt — would you believe us? The best part is that it takes less than five minutes to make and can be prepped ahead so you can have a ready- made yogurt for every day of the week. All you need is two ingredients!

Cook Time: < 5 minutes

Servings: 1

INGREDIENTS:

  • 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt
  • 1/2 scoop of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Isolate Protein
  • Granola and/or fruit toppings (optional)

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Start by adding 1/2 cup of Greek yogurt to a bowl.
  2. Next, add 1/2 a scoop of your favorite SEEQ Clear Whey Isolate Protein flavor.
  3. Mix the ingredients thoroughly until you have a smooth consistency.
  4. Top it off with your favorite fruit and/or granola.
TIPS & TRICKS:
  • Love the mango and pineapple protein powder? After you’ve mixed it with yogurt, arrange pineapple, mango, and banana on top of your yogurt bowl. Sprinkle some shredded coconut on top as well while you are at it. Think açaí bowl level décor but with a bowl of yogurt that is packed with protein. 
  • If the Blue Razz is more your favorite then place some blackberries and raspberries on top of your protein yogurt. For an extra level of crunch and protein, sprinkle some walnuts into your yogurt bowl too.
  • Meal prepping for a long week ahead? This is the perfect breakfast to make ahead of time. Grab some small mason jars or Tupperware and pre-mix your yogurt and protein powder. (And don’t forget those delicious toppings!)
